articles.title: 370-foot asteroid, 4 other space rocks to pass Earth soon, reveals NASA; Check details - HT Tech
articles.description: As many as 5 asteroids are set to pass Earth by close margins in the next few days, NASA has revealed. One of them is a colossal 370-foot asteroid! Know their speed, size, distance of approach, and more.
